name: Mirage Noir Prologue
description:
This is a prologue chapter of "Mirage Noir" visual novel game.

A young local witch, while searching for her familliar, finds a strange glade deep down in the forest.  Surprisingly, she finds an unconscious, worn out man, who needs immediate help. Ignoring her common sense she takes him to her place and does her best, healing his wounds and frostbites.  Their meeting is a start of a strange story, that will shake their world.
